uploadRequirements: All raw data files (original scan quantification or raw reads)
All final processed (normalized) data files e.g expression count matrix
Essential sample annotation and experimental factors with their values
Experimental design with sample data relationship
Sufficient annotation for array or sequence features
Essential laboratory and data processing protocols
subsequentSteps: Upload the file to Geo through https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/account/?back_url=/geo/submitter/
Accession number approval within 5 business days
